about_the_game:
In a land plagued by relentless monsters, the revelation of a mystical portal to the Underworld—the font of pure malevolence—has recently unfolded within Katanosh, the ancient citadel of arcane magic.

In humanity's struggle against darkness, this discovery stands as a beacon of hope. Your mission: lead a trio of adventurers through the portal, delve into the depths of the Underworld, and defeat the Underworld Lords.

Journey into the unknown with Underworld Explorers, a bite-sized roguelike with card and dice mechanics, where you will fight powerful monsters, level up your heroes, find artifacts and explore deeper until you confront the Underworld Lord!

ROGUELIKE

Choose your characters and embark on a unique adventure with each playthrough. Explore diverse scenarios, confront new foes, acquire powerful artifacts, and customize your characters!

CARD AND DICE AND TACTICAL DECISIONS

Inspired by roguelikes and board games, Underworld Explorers offers strategic depth. Each character has four distinct actions available on their turn. These actions can range from attacking, engaging enemies to more complex actions such as rolling an exploration die for each damaged enemy.

You will have to take into account the positioning of the enemies, since they may be engaged with one of your heroes or in the shadows area!

After your heroes take their turn, prepare for the enemies' counterattack. Enemies will move, attack, and unleash their own unique abilities, presenting formidable challenges to overcome.

EXPLORATION

Navigate through scenarios with unique rules that influence your decisions. Your objective remains constant: explore until you discover the exit to the next dungeon! Balancing combat, survival, and exploration will test your tactical prowess at every turn.

CHARACTERS AND ARTIFACTS

Assemble your party from five distinct character classes, each offering a different playstyle. Progress through your run to upgrade your characters to new classes, boasting over 30 choices in total. Equip your party with over 80 artifacts, each enhancing your abilities and bolstering your chances of survival.

BITE-SIZED

Underworld Explorers offers fast-paced gameplay, with runs lasting between 20 and 40 minutes. Every decision carries weight, ensuring a deeply engaging experience that will leave you eager for another adventure!
